EmailTemplate.name: ASI CN NPL Notify Invoice Date
EmailTemplate.subject: A new product {!ASI_CN_NPL_NPL_Request__c.ASI_CN_NPL_Product_Name_English__c} ({!ASI_CN_NPL_NPL_Request__c.ASI_CN_NPL_Classification_New__c}) Invoice Date Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear LOG Users,
For your information, a new product {!ASI_CN_NPL_NPL_Request__c.ASI_CN_NPL_Product_Name_English__c} ({!ASI_CN_NPL_NPL_Request__c.ASI_CN_NPL_Classification__c})'s invoice date information is available now. You could view the detail at {!ASI_CN_NPL_NPL_Request__c.Link}.
